biography_text: COSTELLO, Ryan, a Representative from Pennsylvania; born in Chester County, Pa., on September 7, 1976; graduated from Owen J. Roberts High School, Pottstown, Pa., 1995; B.A., Ursinus College, Collegeville, Pa., 1999; LL.B., Villanova University, Villanova, Pa., 2002; lawyer, private practice; member of the Chester County, Pa., board of commissioners, 2011-2013; elected as a Republican to the One Hundred Fourteenth and to the succeeding Congress (January 3, 2015-present).
